Info:
Lưu ý: Sản phẩm chưa bao gồm Ram, ổ cứng
Chưa bao gồm dây nguồn DAYN009
CPU: Intel® Core™ i3-1220P (10 Nhân, 12 Luồng) Turbo 4.40 GHz
GPU: Intel® UHD Graphics for Gen12
RAM: 2 Slot DDR4-3200 1.2V SODIMMs - Hỗ trợ tối đa 64GB (32GB*2)
HDD: 1 Slot 2.5" Drive - Hỗ trợ tối đa 2TB
SSD: 1 Slot 22x80 NVMe (Key.M) & 22x42 SATA (Key.B) - Hỗ trợ tối đa 2TB
LAN: Intel® Ethernet Controller i225-V
WIFI: Intel® Wi-Fi 6E AX211(Gig+)
OS hỗ trợ: Windows 10 | 11
Detail Info: 2x HDMI 2.1 TMDS Compatible |  2x DP 1.4a via Type C
2x HDMI 2.1 TMDS Compatible |  2x DP 1.4a via Type C
Front: 2x USB 3.2 Rear: 2x USB 4 (type C) |  1x USB 3.2 |  1x USB 2.0 Internal: 1x USB 3.2 on m.2 22x42 (pins) |  2x USB 2.0 (headers)
PCIe x4 Gen 4: M.2 22x80 (key M) PCIe x1 Gen 3: M.2 22x42 (key B) PCIe x1: M.2 22x30 (key E)
‎1 Adapter, Screws, 1 NUC Main Unit, 1 User Manual, Plate
Declaration of conformity : This product complies with the requirements of QCVN 54:2020//BTTTT, QCVN 65:2013/BTTTT under normal Test conditions and extreme test conditions
